Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to negotiate a contract from initiation to finalization.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: Average Time Taken from Contract Initiation to Final Agreement

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Percentage of contracts that undergo renegotiation each year.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: (Number of Contracts Renegotiated Annually / Total Number of Contracts) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Percentage of contracts adhering to all agreed-upon terms and conditions.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Contracts / Total Number of Contracts) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Total monetary savings achieved through renegotiating existing contracts.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: (Total Cost Savings from Renegotiated Contracts / Total Contract Spend) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Average satisfaction score of customers with the terms and conditions outlined in contracts.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Contract Terms

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Percentage of contracts renewed at the end of their initial term.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: (Number of Contracts Renewed / Total Number of Contracts Up for Renewal) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.KPIS: Number of disputes or conflicts during negotiations.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Total number of disputes or conflicts encountered during contract negotiations.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: Total Count of Disputes or Conflicts During Negotiations

Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.KPIS: Percentage of negotiated contracts meeting financial targets.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.EXPLANATION: Percentage of contracts meeting or exceeding financial performance targets set during negotiation.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Contract Negoti.FORMULA: (Number of Negotiated Contracts Meeting Financial Targets / Total Number of Negotiated Contracts) * 100
